alert.note: Alert for Jefferson Davis; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 16 at 2:24PM CST until February 16 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN MARION...COVINGTON AND SOUTHERN JEFFERSON DAVIS COUNTIES... At 224 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Collins, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Collins around 235 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bassfield and Seminary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for south central, central and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
